title: Game-Based Learning Program for Strengthening Self-Directed Chemical Leadership Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic chemical theory and comprehension of experimental principles
context.additional_context: Goal-Oriented Game-Based Learning Environment Accessible via Smartphones to Strengthen Decision-Making Competencies of Chemistry-Related Corporate Managers/Leaders

learning_goals: Enhancing the ability to analyze chemical reaction mechanisms through simulation games and apply them to real-world tasks
Performing effective decision-making in chemical safety management scenarios through game-based collaborative learning
Improving resource allocation efficiency by 30% using optimization strategies in a chemical experiment design game

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
